about:
Hello! I'm Farhan, born and raised in Singapore! 

As a client-facing technologist, I've a track record of building cloud native solutions that are scalable and reusable across diverse technological areas and stacks. With a focus on designing solutions that ensures resiliency in systems, I am also an avid advocate for Chaos Engineering, actively introducing these practices into the software development life cycle.

Iâ€™m also a polyglot programmer who primarily focuses on modernising applications with distributed architectures and develop with failures in mind. I also enjoy contributing to Open Source software in my spare time.
